title: Language Education Program Design Based on Consciousness and Expression Models

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Designing integrated programs combining social interaction and tool utilization to improve language efficiency in workplace contexts.

learning_goals: Learners can systematically restructure linguistic expressions in daily work contexts using motivational tools (notebooks, voice recording apps, etc.)
Through project-based collaboration, learners can identify and apply three or more language expression strategies in social contexts
Using expression modeling techniques that transcend internal/external cognitive boundaries, learners can interpret and compose complex task instructions with over 80% accuracy

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
